segments.text: Did you read the news that ' China's property prices rose at the fastest pace in 18 months in December , ending the year with rising fears of bubbles in the property market ' ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . Does the newspaper say what has caused that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . It says the hike was a result of purchase rush in the fourth quarter on expectations of tightening politics .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think the government should make a serves of moves to cool the market .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right . The climbing property prices has become a headache for Chinese residents .
segments.speaker: S1
